data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of Monolepta pallidula species group in Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng (2009): A taxonomic revision of Monolepta pallidula species group in Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae). Zootaxa 2170: 15-27, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189193
